schools.name: Richmond-Burton High School
schools.school-summary: Richmond-Burton High School, a public school located in Richmond, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Richmond-Burton Chsd 157 School District.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Nippersink Middle School
schools.school-summary: Nippersink Middle School, a public school located in Richmond, IL, serves grades 6-8 in the Nippersink School District 2.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Richmond Grade School
schools.school-summary: Richmond Grade School, a public school located in Richmond, IL, serves grades PK-5 in the Nippersink School District 2.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
